subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter scored 26 points, including a driving basket with 13.5 seconds left that lifted the Liberty to a 69-66 victory over the Washington Mystics on Tuesday night in Newark.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter scored 26 points, including a driving basket with 13.5 seconds left that lifted the Liberty to a 69-66 victory over the Washington Mystics on Tuesday night in Newark.
